_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: LeagueSandbox
author: domi@imagine.team
description: A simple egg to run LeagueSandbox server in pterodactyl

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash

apt update
apt install -y zip unzip jq curl wget git

mkdir -p /mnt/server
cd /mnt/server

git clone https://github.com/LeagueSandbox/GameServer.git
rm .git -rf

cd GameServer/

git submodule init
git submodule update

dotnet build .
cp -r GameServerConsole/bin/Debug/net6.0/* /mnt/server/
cp -r Content /mnt/server/Content
echo "done"
